entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -12.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
